amendment.description: An amendment numbered 65 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds from being made available to authorize U.S. financial institutions whose property and interests in property are blocked pursuant to Executive Order 13902 other than a transaction for the sale of agricultural commodities, food, medicine, or medical devices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
